name: Tora Tora
overview:
Tora Tora was produced by Taiyo System in 1980.

Protect your 16 destroyers located in the harbor from enemy planes using a mobile anti-aircraft gun.
Planes fly across the top of the screen dropping bombs on your destroyers. The destroyers do not fire back. Beneath them, at the very bottom, is your mobile anti-aircraft gun. Use it to protect your 16 ships in the harbor. You may also have kamikaze attacks from the planes. Keep a lookout.
